title: It´s not futura, not Neutraface2, any help pleeeeease?
author: rafaelo

comments.content: Looks like Century Gothic to me.

Neither Century Gothic to me. But strange because, part of /R, the rest looks pretty spot on with Neutraface 2 Display and especially /S... What's your sample origin? Could help to identify it...  
Alternative: [Euclid Flex](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830061601/http:/www.swisstypefaces.com/fonts/euclid-flex)
